attributes.action: Put more police on the street, and reduce the hours of mindless paperwork so that the innocent start to feel safe again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have had enough of police not responding to the cries of the innocent and not being able to punish the guilty. Gone are the days people feel safe on the street due to a lack of police presence and response time. Its time for a change! The government must support the good people and actually punish the guilty, rather than soft sentences!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
